Heading: Problems in school?
Value: Constantly being teased in school due to being overweight. He was 6’4'' and 250 lbs. at age 14

Value: Registered nurse at Hudson River Psychiatric Hospital, Career Counselor for youths

Value: No record of any time spent in a forensic or other psychological facility

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Age of victims
Value: Ranging in age from 25-51, but most were in their 20s and 30s

Heading: Type of serial killer
Value: Missionary Serial Killer, mixture of organized and disorganized

Value: Found and picked up victims nearby and drove them back to his home

Killing occurred in home of killer?

Heading: Left at scene, no attempt to hide

Heading: Sentence
Value: Eight counts of 25 years to life which much be served consecutively plus assault charges on the last victim (Franco) which totaled 1-3 years
